name: Labrador
description: Labradors are friendly, outgoing, and highly trainable. Great for families and as service dogs.

name: German Shepherd
description: German Shepherds are loyal, courageous, and excel in police and service work. They require regular exercise.

name: Beagle
description: Beagles are cheerful and curious. They are good with children and have a keen sense of smell.

name: Poodle
description: Poodles are smart, active, and versatile. They excel in obedience and are hypoallergenic.

name: Bulldog
description: Bulldogs are gentle, loving, and get along well with children. They are known for their distinctive appearance.

name: Golden Retriever
description: Golden Retrievers are intelligent, eager to please, and excellent with families and children.

name: Dachshund
description: Dachshunds are playful and clever. They are known for their long bodies and strong hunting instincts.

name: Shiba Inu
description: Shiba Inus are alert, agile, and spirited. They are independent but loyal to their families.

name: Boxer
description: Boxers are fun-loving, energetic, and protective. They make excellent companions for active owners.

name: Pembroke Welsh Corgi
description: Corgis are affectionate, alert, and enjoy being part of the family. They have short legs and a sturdy build.

name: Siberian Husky
description: Siberian Huskies are known for their striking appearance and friendly nature. They require a lot of exercise and mental stimulation.

name: Alaskan Malamute
description: Alaskan Malamutes are strong and affectionate. They are known for their endurance and love for cold weather.

name: Chihuahua
description: Chihuahuas are small but full of personality. They are loyal companions and can be quite sassy.

name: Pug
description: Pugs are known for their charming personalities and distinctive wrinkled faces. They are affectionate and great with families.

name: Rottweiler
description: Rottweilers are confident and fearless. They are loyal companions and make excellent guard dogs.

name: Yorkshire Terrier
description: Yorkshire Terriers are small but full of energy and personality. They are affectionate and make great companions.

name: Dalmatian
description: Dalmatians are known for their distinctive spotted coat. They are energetic and require regular exercise.

name: Schnauzer
description: Schnauzers are known for their distinctive beard and eyebrows. They are intelligent and make great family pets.

name: Border Collie
description: Border Collies are highly intelligent and energetic. They excel in obedience and agility training.

name: Great Dane
description: Great Danes are known for their enormous size and gentle nature. They are affectionate and great with families.

name: Shih Tzu
description: Shih Tzus are known for their long, flowing coats and friendly personalities. They are great companions.

name: Pomeranian
description: Pomeranians are small, fluffy, and full of energy. They are intelligent and make great companions.

name: Bullmastiff
description: Bullmastiffs are known for their strength and protective nature. They are gentle giants and great family pets.

name: Cocker Spaniel
description: Cocker Spaniels are friendly and affectionate. They are great with children and love to play.

name: Boston Terrier
description: Boston Terriers are known for their friendly and lively nature. They are great companions and adapt well to various living situations.

name: Shetland Sheepdog
description: Shetland Sheepdogs are intelligent and energetic. They excel in herding and obedience tasks.

name: Bichon Frise
description: Bichon Frises are cheerful and playful. They are known for their fluffy coats and friendly demeanor.

name: Caucasian Shepherd
description: Caucasian Shepherds are large and powerful dogs known for their protective nature. They are loyal and require experienced handling.
